title: Magazine Of Horror #23 v04n05 [1968-09]
description: CONTENTS: Magazine Of Horror [v4 #5, #23, September 1968] (50¢, 132pp, digest s/s, cover by Virgil Finlay) 4 · The Editor’s Page · Robert A. W. Lowndes · ed; about David H. Keller. 6 · The Abyss [Part 1 of 2] · David H. Keller · n. The Solitary Hunters And The Abyss , New Era 1948; illustrated by John V. Baltadonis 57 · The Death Mask · Mrs. H. D. Everett · ss The Death-Mask, And Other Ghosts , Philip Allan 1920; abridged. 66 · One By One · Richard M. Hodgens · ss 72 · The Thirteenth Floor · Douglas M. Dold · ss Strange Tales Of Mystery And Terror November 1931 85 · Leapers · Robert A. W. Lowndes · nv; revised from “The Leapers”, as by Carol Grey, Future Fantasy And Science Fiction , December 1942. 113 · It Is Written · [The Readers] · lc [letter] · Stanley Zebrowski · lt; cited rather than quoted. [letter] · L. Sprague de Camp · lt [letter] · Charles Hidley · lt [letter] · Steffan B. Aletti · lt [letter] · John Linehan · lt [letter] · Richard Grose · lt [letter] · Herbert E. Beach · lt 115 · The Reckoning · Robert A. W. Lowndes · ms 117 · Coming Next Issue · Anon. · ms; excerpt from “Once In A Thousand Years” by Frances Bragg Middleton. 129 · Reader’s Preference Page (poll ballot) · [Misc.] · ms House ads for Startling Mystery Stories (excerpt from “Webbed Hands” by Ferdinand Berthoud), World-Wide Adventure (ex from “Tibetan Image” by Herb Lewis), Exploring the Unknown , and Famous SF (announcing a new Robert Silverberg story, “The Fires Die Down,” and stories by Festus Pragnell, Laurence Manning, Phillip K. Dick, and Gerald W. Page; the previous issue boasts Leslie F. Stone, Manning, John Scott Campbell, de Camp, and Burt K. Filer). · [Misc.] · ms
